  • AWS KINESIS Video Streaming
  • Web browser
  • View page source

Web browser

  1. For viewing the Kinesis Video Stream on AWS Dashboard, open the following link in the web browser: https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/kinesisvideo/home?region=us-east-1#/dashboard

Figure 12: AWS KINESIS Login

  1. Select the AWS Cloud region from the top-right drop-down menu

Figure 13: AWS Region selection

  1. Click on [Signaling channels] on the left panel and select [T2_VIDEO] from Signaling channels.

Figure 14: AWS KINESIS Dashboard – signaling channels

  1. Click on [Media playback viewer] and click the center Play button to start/pause the streaming.

Figure 15: AWS KINESIS Dashboard – video streaming

  1. Click on [Viewer statistics] link below the Media playback viewer to view stream information such as: bitrate and audio/video codec, resolution and so on.
